About me

PDF - Update: 2019/12/17

Research Interest

  • Graph Theory and Extremal Graph Theory
  • Discrete and Convex Optimization
  • Functional Analysis

Education

Hanoi University of Science and Technology - B.Eng.

2015 - 2020 | Applied Mathematics and Informatics (Talented Program); GPA: 3.60 (major: 3.92).

Vietnam National University, High School for Gifted Students

2011 - 2014 | Mathematics.

Research Experience

RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project

Jun 2019 - Sep 2019 | Language Information Access Technology Team; Host: Tiphaine Viard.
  • Research on community detection under the link stream model. Collaborator: Dr. Tiphaine Viard.
  • Research on cooperative game theory. Collaborator: Dr. Takanori Maehara

HUST School of Applied Mathematics and Informatics

2017 - Present | Advisor: Dr. Ngoc C. Le.
  • Research on graph theory. Our result shows that the dominating set problem is polynomial in (fork, $Z_2$)-free graphs.

Publications

Minimum Dominating set problems in (fork, $\bar{P_5}$)-free and (claw, $P_5$)-free graphs.

Community Detection in Link Stream.

Tu Nguyen, Tiphaine Viard, and Takanori Maehara. To appear.
